attributes.action: urge the Health Secreatary to reinstate Professor David Nutt as chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the Government is cynically attempting to engage in deliberate misinformation in order to meet some moral argument.  It is imperative that scientific results, and scientists, are not selectively exploited in order to support arguments that are essentially false.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
